dt: {bc}a small box (as in a {d_link|checklist|checklist}) in which to place a check mark {dx_def}see {dxt|check:2||7}{/dx_def} to make a selection, indicate completion of a task, etc.

shortdef: a small box (as in a checklist) in which to place a check mark to make a selection, indicate completion of a task, etc.
